sections.text: Amount of tender.When the defendant is admitted to prevent a new partition, as is said in the preceding article, if he furnishes the supplement in money, it must be with interest from the day of the institution of the suit; if he furnishes it in* effects, he is bound to restore the fruits from the same day.* English translation of French text incomplete; should include "hereditary."
